item.title: Deploy a website with Cloudflare Pages and Hugo
item.description: A good start for my blog would be a post where I would explain how I set-up this site, Options for hosting a static (Hugo) website So why Cloudflare pages? Free Free traffic (nice for imagges) Can add my own domain The setup of Cloudflare pages For extra variable add: HUGO_VERSION = 0.80.0

item.title: Installing and hands-on with Slimme Lezer
item.description: After reading this article on a Dutch tech site I was immediately hooked, especially they announced the 2021.8.0 update. The 2021.8.0 Home Assistant update The ‘Slimme lezer" a.k.a. “Smart reader” Setting up the Slimme lezer Bla bla bla
